Desc.eng: Get lost, hunter! This is our territory!
No throat-ripping? No foaming? How polite.
I’m not here to hunt you down. I want to destroy Fulmigati, just like you. We could be allies.
I heard that you spared the Vrikolak leader in the mountains. You look like a tough warrior. We could be allies, yes. But we only defend our territory.

I heard that you killed a Vrikolak leader in the mountains. I don’t trust you. But we fight the same enemy, so we could be allies, yes… for a price. We need 10,000 gold. And we only defend our territory.
I can’t pay you that much.
Beastly bodyguards? Sounds like a good idea.
